metadata.title: CVE-2024-30261 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. An attackercan alter the `integrity` option passed to `fetch()`, allowing `fetch()` toaccept requests as valid even if they have been tampered. Thisvulnerability was patched in version(s) 5.28.4 and 6.11.1.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
